High exchange expenses! Estimated amounts: 
- University Services & Support fee: $623 per term
- Columbia Health and Related Services fee: $543 per term
- International Student Fee: $120 per term
- Document Fee: $105 (entitles students to electronic and mailed transcripts)
- Columbia Health and Related Services Fee: $623 per term
- Columbia Student Medical Insurance: Fall ~$1,500, Spring ~$2,400
More info from Columbia website.
